SELECT s.id, s.warehouse_id as warehouseId, w.name as warehouseName, s.product, s.model, s.unit, s.count, s.create_time as createTime FROM stock s LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON s.warehouse_id = w.id
AND s.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
AND s.product LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product}, '%')
AND s.model LIKE CONCAT('%', #{model}, '%')
order by s.create_time desc
